Accuracy.description: Rerolling a check when crafting an item. Chance to not consume an artifact's charge.

Acrobat.description: The hero is incredibly flexible. Can navigate narrow spaces and hard-to-reach places.

Magic Allergy.description: The hero is adversely affected by any spell.

Artist.description: Ability to play musical instruments, sing, compose poetry, and disguise.

Athleticism.description: The hero has an athletic build TODO: +3 Hit Points. +1 Body Defense. .

Harmless.description: Enemies do not see the hero as a threat and try not to attack him. -1 intimidation checks, +1 disguise checks.

Blessed.description: The hero honors all gods. Receives an additional effect when praying and making offerings.

Battle Rage.description: No penalty for the first level of Wound.

Faithful Friend.description: The hero chooses an ally. That ally gains +1 to all checks when they act together.

Sudden Insight.description: +2 Attribute Points. This talent can be used an unlimited number of times.

Lone Wolf.description: +1 bonus to all checks, attacks, and damage when acting alone, without allies.

Streetwise.description: +1 damage with small melee weapons (knives, fists)

Second Chance.description: Upon receiving fatal damage, the Hero is reduced to 1 Hit Point. Once per battle.

Bruiser.description: The Hero deals +1 damage with his left melee weapon.

Wild.description: The Hero feels at one with the wild. +1 to all checks and AP if no armor equipped.

Elemental Child.description: The Hero receives a +1 bonus to checks and damage if near a related element.

Sitting Duck.description: Enemies will try to attack the Hero first.

Tenacious.description: The Hero always receives more than half the effect from healing potions and abilities.

Priest of Love.description: The hero is incredibly attractive and skilled in love. +1 on seduction checks.

Inveterate Gambler.description: +11 to all gambling checks, knowledge of bluffing and betting rules.

Feral Reflexes.description: All Defenses: +2 against area attacks and opportunity attacks.

Beasts Expert.description: +1 on creature-related checks. By spending a round, the hero can identify a weak spot.

Poison Expert.description: Chance to avoid poisoning. +1 bonus when working with poisons.

Perfect Memory.description: The hero can memorize every minute detail and text with just one glance.

Chosen.description: Hears the voice of the chosen deity and follows their instructions.

Intuition.description: The hero is always considered armed and can sense danger.

Cartographer.description: Accelerated movement on the map. Bonus to discovering new locations.

Fistfighter.description: Unarmed Damage d4. Armor +1 in melee combat without armor.

Chef.description: Advantage when preparing high-quality food. Signature dish, which provides additional bonuses.

Leader.description: Inspires allies, giving them +1 to non-combat checks. Charismatic orator.

Fate's Favorite.description: The hero has the incredible ability to emerge unharmed from the most dangerous situations.

Heightened Senses.description: +1 to all hearing, smell, and touch checks. Distinguishes the slightest smells and tastes.

Educated.description: Additional 1 skill point at each level. Knowledge of the natural sciences.

Gifted.description: Hero easily learns new skills. Receives more bonus skill points.

Keen Eye.description: All range +2. The hero is incredibly farsighted.

Pyromancer.description: The hero loves fire. +1 chance to set on fire, +1 fire damage, +2 fire resistance.

Field Medic.description: The hero can revive a coma during combat and heal allies with a Medicine check.

Summoner.description: Grants the ability to subjugate a summoned or enchanted creature.

Magic Conduit.description: The hero can cast artifacts and enchantments with a "touch" from a distance of 2 squares.

Ritualist.description: +1 major and 2 minor rituals per day. The hero can reroll ritual checks.

Strength of Spirit.description: +1 Mana for each Will point. +1 Intelligence. The hero is strong in character and will.

Theorist.description: +Makes any two skills dependent on Intelligence, granting theoretical knowledge.

Thick-Skinned.description: The hero gains 1 point of Armor.

Hasty.description: -1 AP to all non-attacking actions (drinking potion, taking an item from a bag, etc.)

Monster Slayer.description: +1 to Attacks and damage against large creatures. +1 when searching for information about monsters.

Lucky.description: Once per day, the hero can re-roll a forehead check.

Cold Calculation.description: Allows the hero to make a forehead check with advantage once per scene.

Body Language.description: Influences beasts, savages, and intelligent creatures speaking a different language.

Linguist.description: Knowledge of an additional language for every second INT point.

Warlock.description: has magical powers and can perform spells and rituals.

Son of Night.description: At night, he can reroll any check once per night. At night, he heals himself for 1d4 hit points.
